body_html: For some reason I think your clang++ compiler is not compiling with -std=c++11. Can you move the line specifying the standard in build_all.sh from https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/build_all.sh#L140 to line 125?
body_text: For some reason I think your clang++ compiler is not compiling with -std=c++11. Can you move the line specifying the standard in build_all.sh from https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/build_all.sh#L140 to line 125?
body: For some reason I think your clang++ compiler is not compiling with `-std=c++11`. Can you move the line specifying the standard in `build_all.sh` from https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/build_all.sh#L140 to line 125?
